title: Addresses
subtitle: Manage the digital addresses on which to receive SEND's legally-binding communications and/or the related courtesy messages.

legal-contacts.title: Legal address

pec-validation-banner.title: PEC validation in progress
pec-validation-banner.dod-enabled-message: Until the process is complete, the SEND Platform remains active as a digital domicile.
pec-validation-banner.dod-disabled-message: Until the process is complete, it will not be possible to modify legally-binding addresses.
pec-validation-banner.parties-list: The SEND platform will remain your digital domicile for {{list}} until the validation is complete.

legal-contacts.pec-disclaimer: This is the main address that will be used to send you digital notifications. By entering it, you will no longer receive paper registered mail.
legal-contacts.pec-description: When an institution sends a communication for you on SEND, you will receive the official notification at the PEC you selected.
legal-contacts.pec-verify-descr: We have sent a code to the indicated PEC address. The code is valid for 15 minutes.
legal-contacts.pec-new-code: Did you not receive it? Check if you entered the correct PEC or <0>generate a new code</0>.
legal-contacts.remove-pec-title: Do you confirm to want to deactivate the PEC?
legal-contacts.remove-pec-message: <0>You will no longer have a legal digital address for the communications of the Public Administration and you might receive them on paper, with eventual costs charged to you.</0><1>You will however continue to receive alerts on the channels you have activated.</1>
legal-contacts.validation-cancel-content: If you confirm, you cancel the activation of the PEC as digital domicile on SEND.
legal-contacts.validation-progress-content: We are verifying that the PEC address is valid. You will receive an email with the result within 24 hours.
legal-contacts.sercq_send-description: When an institution sends you a SEND notification, it is delivered securely and with legal value through the platform itself.
legal-contacts.sercq-send-description-pec-enabled: Use SEND as your digital domicile to manage your SEND notifications in one place, without worrying about paper registered mail and associated costs.
legal-contacts.sercq-send-info-title: Activate SEND as your Digital Domicile
legal-contacts.sercq-send-info-description: If you activate the Digital Domicile, SEND will become your legal address for PA communications.

sercq-send-info-list.title: 100% digital notifications
sercq-send-info-list.description: You will no longer receive paper notifications.

sercq-send-info-list.title: Savings on postage costs
sercq-send-info-list.description: You no longer have to worry about collecting paper documents and paying the relative costs.

sercq-send-info-list.title: Everything in one place
sercq-send-info-list.description: SEND notifications will be delivered to you securely and will all be available in your SEND reserved area.

legal-contacts.remove-sercq_send-title: Do you confirm to want to deactivate the Digital Domicile on SEND?
legal-contacts.remove-sercq_send-message: <0>If you choose to deactivate your SEND digital domicile you might receive communications via registered mail and pay the relative costs.<1>You will continue to receive alerts via email, you can deactivate them in the Addresses section.
legal-contacts.block-remove-digital-domicile-title: It is not possible to deactivate the Digital Domicile
legal-contacts.block-remove-digital-domicile-message: To proceed, you must first deactivate the personalized digital domiciles per institution.
legal-contacts.sercq-send-io-description: Activate SEND - Notifiche Digitali on IO to receive the communications sent to your SEND digital domicile directly in app.

sercq-send-wizard.title: Activate digital domicile on SEND
sercq-send-wizard.title-transfer: Transfer the digital domicile to the SEND platform

step_1.title: How it works

info-list.title: An institution sends you a notification on SEND
info-list.description: The notification is <0>delivered</0> to you securely and with legal value through the platform

info-list.title: You receive a message
info-list.description: When a notification arrives on SEND, we will notify you via email and on the channels you prefer

info-list.title: Access the notification
info-list.description: Open the details of the digital notification on the SEND platform or, if you have activated the service, directly from the IO app

step_1.info-tos: By pressing “Activate” you declare to have read and accepted the <0>Terms of service</0>.
step_1.have-pec-description: Alternatively, you can use a PEC as your digital domicile for SEND notifications.
step_1.delivered-dialog-title: Legal value of the notification on the SEND digital domicile
step_1.delivered-dialog-description: If you choose SEND as your digital domicile, 7 days after delivery the notification will be considered legally delivered, even if you have not viewed it.
step_1.pec-info-alert: The SEND platform will replace the PEC as your digital domicile.

step_2.title: Connect SEND to the IO app
step_2.content: Connecting SEND to IO is the most convenient way to receive and manage legally-binding communications.
io-list: Receive notifications in real-time, as soon as the institution uploads them to SEND
You can open and read the documents attached to the notification
You can pay any amounts due if the notification involves a payment

step_3.title: Your email to receive alerts on SEND notifications
step_3.content: The email where we will notify you when you receive a legally-binding communication for you on SEND.
step_3.sms-disclaimer: If you press Add number you save this address to receive alerts on your SEND notifications. You can manage it in the Addresses. section

step_4.title: You are activating your digital domicile on SEND
step_4.content: Your legally-binding communications will be delivered to:
step_4.courtesy-content: You have chosen to receive a message on:
step_4.disclaimer: By pressing “Activate digital domicile” you declare to have read the <0>Privacy Policy</0> and accept the <1>Terms of service</1>

feedback.title-transfer: You have updated your digital domicile
feedback.title-sercq_send-activation: You have activated your digital domicile on SEND
feedback.title-sercq_send-transfer: You have transferred your digital domicile to SEND
feedback.content-pec: The PEC you entered is being validated. Once confirmed, the digital domicile will be activated and you will receive all legally-binding communications at the address you selected.
feedback.content-pec-transfer: The PEC is being validated. Once confirmed, your digital domicile will be transferred to the address you selected. Until then, the SEND digital domicile will remain active.
feedback.content-sercq_send: You will receive your legally-binding communications at your digital domicile on SEND and a message at the addresses you selected.
feedback.go-to-contacts: Go back to your contact details

pec-contact-wizard.title: Use a PEC as digital domicile
pec-contact-wizard.title-transfer: Transfer the digital domicile to a PEC
pec-contact-wizard.content-description: When an institution sends you a SEND notification, you will receive the legally-binding communication at the PEC you selected.
pec-contact-wizard.sercq-info-alert: The PEC will replace the SEND platform as your digital domicile.
pec-contact-wizard.disclaimer: I accept that this address is used by SEND in priority over any PEC registered with a sending institution or present in public registries.

digital-domicile-management.title: Manage your digital domicile
digital-domicile-management.sercq_send-active: The SEND platform is your digital domicile

transfer.title-pec: Transfer the digital domicile to the SEND platform
transfer.content-pec: The SEND platform guarantees secure and legally-binding deliveries. The service is free and does not require additional tools.
transfer.title-sercq_send: Transfer the digital domicile to a PEC
transfer.content-sercq_send: If you have a PEC, you can use it as a digital domicile for SEND notifications.

special_contacts.title: Personalize your digital domicile per sending institution
special_contacts.content: Choose where to receive the notifications sent to you by a specific institution.

io-contact.title: SEND on the IO app
io-contact.description: Connecting SEND to IO is the most convenient way to receive and manage legally-binding communications: when there is a notification for you, you receive it in app and you can pay any expenses.
io-contact.description-enabled: When there is a notification for you, you receive it directly in app and you can pay any expenses.

disable-modal.title: Deactivate SEND on the IO app
disable-modal.content: If you confirm, you will no longer receive SEND notifications in the app.
disable-modal.content-dod-enabled: <0>If you deactivate SEND on IO, you will no longer receive SEND notifications in the app.<1>Remember that if you do not read a SEND notification in time, you might not be aware of any deadlines and incur penalties.

info-modal.title: SEND on IO: how it works
info-modal.subtitle: For every new SEND notification, you receive a message on the IO app from which you can easily open the attached documents and make any planned payments.
info-modal.content: If you do not have an active digital domicile and do not open the message within 5 days of sending, you will receive the documents in paper format at home.

courtesy-contacts.email-empty-description: Add an email address where we can notify you when there is a notification to read on SEND.
courtesy-contacts.email-filled-description: When there is a notification for you, we will inform you with an email to the address you selected.
courtesy-contacts.email-sms-updates: Do you want to receive alerts via SMS too?
courtesy-contacts.sms-description: When there is a notification for you, we will inform you with an SMS.
courtesy-contacts.email-verify-descr: We have sent a code to the indicated email address. The code is valid for 15 minutes.
courtesy-contacts.sms-verify-descr: We have sent a code to the indicated mobile number. The code is valid for 15 minutes.
courtesy-contacts.email-new-code: Did you not receive it? Check if you entered the correct email or <0>generate a new code</0>.
courtesy-contacts.sms-new-code: Did you not receive it? Check if you entered the correct mobile number or <0>generate a new code</0>.
courtesy-contacts.email-and-sercq-removed-successfully: Email and SEND digital domicile deactivated
courtesy-contacts.io-added-successfully: You have activated the SEND - Digital Notifications service on IO.
courtesy-contacts.io-removed-successfully: You have deactivated the SEND - Digital Notifications service on IO.
courtesy-contacts.remove-email-pec-enabled-title: Do you want to deactivate email alerts?
courtesy-contacts.remove-email-pec-enabled-message: <0>If you deactivate the email address <strong>we cannot notify you when there is a legally-binding communication for you/strong>.</0><1>Remember that if you do not read a SEND notification in time, you might not be aware of any deadlines and incur penalties.</1>
courtesy-contacts.remove-email-no-domicile-message: If you confirm, you will no longer receive the email on {{value}} when there is a SEND notification to read.
courtesy-contacts.remove-email-preconfirm-title: Do you want to deactivate email alerts?
courtesy-contacts.remove-email-preconfirm-message: <0>If you deactivate the email address we cannot notify you when there is a legally-binding communication for you.
courtesy-contacts.remove-email-and-sercq-title: The SEND digital domicile is also deactivated with the email
courtesy-contacts.remove-email-and-sercq-message: <0>If you choose to deactivate your SEND digital domicile you might receive communications via registered mail and pay the relative costs.
courtesy-contacts.remove-sms-title-dod-enabled: Do you want to deactivate SMS alerts?
courtesy-contacts.remove-sms-message-dod-enabled: <0>If you deactivate your phone number you will not receive SMS alerts when there is a legally-binding communication for you on SEND.<1>Remember that if you do not read a SEND notification in time, you might not be aware of any deadlines and incur penalties.
courtesy-contacts.remove-sms-message: If you confirm, you will no longer receive the SMS on {{value}} when there is a SEND notification to read.
courtesy-contacts.info-modal-email-subtitle: When there are new SEND notifications for you, you will receive an alert at the email address entered.
courtesy-contacts.info-modal-email-content: If you do not have an active digital domicile and do not open the notification within 5 days of sending the email, you will receive the documents in paper format at home.
courtesy-contacts.info-modal-sms-subtitle: When there are new notifications for you, you will receive an SMS at the number entered.
courtesy-contacts.info-modal-sms-content: If you do not have an active digital domicile and do not open the notification within 5 days of sending the SMS, you will receive the documents in paper format at home.
courtesy-contacts.confirmation-modal-title: Add an email address for alerts!
courtesy-contacts.confirmation-modal-io-title: Adding your contact details is important!
courtesy-contacts.confirmation-modal-io-content: If you do not connect SEND to IO you will not receive an in-app message when you receive a legally-binding communication on SEND.
courtesy-contacts.confirmation-modal-disable-io-content: If you disconnect SEND from IO you will not receive an in-app message when you receive a legally-binding communication on SEND.
courtesy-contacts.confirmation-modal-email-content: To activate the SEND digital domicile we need your email address, so we can notify you when there is a legally-binding communication for you.
courtesy-contacts.block-remove-email-title: It is not possible to deactivate the email
courtesy-contacts.block-remove-email-message: To proceed, you must first remove the personalized emails per institution.
courtesy-contacts.block-remove-email-sercq-default-pec-spe: To proceed, you must first deactivate the digital domicile and the personalized addresses.
courtesy-contacts.block-remove-sms-title: It is not possible to deactivate the mobile number
courtesy-contacts.block-remove-sms-message: To proceed, you must first eliminate the personalized mobile numbers per institution.

special-contacts.contact-to-add-description: The personalized digital domicile where you will receive the SEND notifications sent to you by a specific institution
special-contacts.contact-already-exists: <0>This institution is already associated with the address {{contactValue}}.<1>If you press Confirm, you will replace it with the one just entered.
special-contacts.validating-pec-banner-content: <0>You have already entered a PEC for this institution which is in the validation phase.</0><1>Once confirmed, you can modify it.</1>
special-contacts.validating-pec-error-message: You have already entered a PEC for this institution that is currently in validation
special-contacts.fetch-party-error: We were unable to retrieve the data needed to create a new address.
special-contacts.add-title: Enter the institution and the address to associate
special-contacts.remove-special-description: The alerts related to the notifications of the associated institutions will no longer be sent to this address, but to the main one.
special-contacts.pec-disclaimer: I accept that this address is used by SEND in priority over any PEC registered with a sending institution or present in public registries.

courtesy-banner.title: Feature dismissed
courtesy-banner.description: You can no longer enter personalized courtesy addresses per institution or modify existing addresses. If you delete a personalized address, you will not be able to recover it or re-enter it.

special-contacts.email-description: The email where we will notify you when you receive a legally-binding communication for you on SEND.
special-contacts.sercq-disclaimer: By pressing “Confirm” you declare to have read the <0>Privacy Policy</0> and accept the <1>Terms of service</1>

common.duplicate-contact-descr: The contact {{value}} is already present, do you still want to proceed?
common.duplicate-default-contact-title: This address is already used as a digital domicile
common.duplicate-default-contact-descr:
The address {{value}} is already used as the main digital domicile on SEND.
To personalize the digital domicile per sending institution, choose a different address.

invalid_verification_code.title: Wrong code
invalid_verification_code.message: Check and re-enter it, or generate another one.

retry_limit_code.title: You have made too many attempts
retry_limit_code.message: You have entered the wrong code too many times. To try again, press "Cancel", make sure the contact is correct and enter the new code.

expired_verification_code.title: This code has expired
expired_verification_code.message: Generate a new one and enter it.

domicile-banner.no-sercq-send-title: No more paper documents: activate SEND as a Digital Domicile
domicile-banner.no-sercq-send-description: Select the SEND platform as a Digital Domicile to receive the next notifications only digitally and to read them in real time, from anywhere.
domicile-banner.no-courtesy-description: Without a courtesy address, we cannot inform you when there is a legal communication to read on SEND.
domicile-banner.no-io-description: When there is a notification for you, you can receive it on the IO app, read it and pay any expenses directly in app!
domicile-banner.add-io: Activate SEND on the IO app
domicile-banner.no-courtesy-sercq-send-title: Do you want to receive the next notifications only digitally?
domicile-banner.no-courtesy-sercq-send-description: Activate SEND as the Digital Domicile and stop worrying about registered mail.
domicile-banner.no-courtesy-no-sercq-send-description: Add an email address to receive a notification when you have a new notification on SEND.
